content:
/>
Introduction
This topic contains information on unidentifiable mail, including
definition of unidentifiable mail
processing unidentifiable mail in CM
supervisory review of unidentifiable mail
records management officer (RMO) review of unidentifiable mail
action required upon receipt of identifying information for unidentifiable mail
, and
maintenance of unidentifiable mail prior to implementation of the CM unidentifiable mail queues
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Mail Management
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
